𓁹 ⲓⲉⲣ ⋍ ⲓⲣⲓ ⇔ faire > re-… ⲉⲣ- er-… ver… ⲓⲣⲓ ⲛⲃⲉⲣⲓ = renew, erneuern, make new
𓁹 ⲓⲉⲣ ⋍ ⲓⲣⲓ > re-… ver- ⲉⲣ- er-… ⲓⲣⲓ ⲛⲃⲉⲣⲓ = renew, erneuern, make new

Ubiquitous prefix in IE languages,
Contrast the repetitive component of re- versus the causative component of german er-…

RE6 𒁺 kin kühn ĝen gehen ⇔ 𓏱 gone (gün 𒀭)
